changeSet.author: Alexandra
changeSet.sql: create table user ( user_id integer not null auto_increment, email varchar(255) not null unique, user_name varchar(255) not null, surname varchar(255) not null, birthday date not null, passport varchar(255) not null, address varchar(255) not null, password varchar(255) not null, primary key (user_id))
create table role ( role_id integer not null auto_increment, role_name varchar(255) not null, primary key (role_id))

create table user_role ( user_id integer not null, role_id integer not null, primary key (user_id, role_id), foreign key (user_id) references user(user_id) on delete cascade on update cascade, foreign key (role_id) references role(role_id) on delete cascade on update cascade )
